text: WATCH @MCFC boss Manuel Pellegrini: on beating Southampton: "We have to play in that moment for 25 games." http://t.co/jPM3n9kNCT
NEW POLL Which was your favourite #BPL goal of the weekend? Head to http://t.co/w3EwiAn4W2 to vote... http://t.co/exZBa2RV5Z
Everton v Sunderland in the #BU21PL is live on @SkySports at 1845 GMT from Goodison Park http://t.co/UCOUEXOwpY
.@ManUtd can win 4 consecutive #BPL matches for only the 2nd time since Sir Alex Ferguson left v @stokecity #MUNSTK http://t.co/b4wixL4AxQ
.@Everton's @OfficielArounaK and @Bryan_Oviedo made their mark in the #BU21PL on Monday. More: http://t.co/LHkffFqELw http://t.co/lMWZsSDoyF
TEAM NEWS Benteke returns for @AVFCOfficial coming in for Sanchez as @CPFC replace Ledey and Zaha with Puncheon & McArthur #CRYAVL
GOAL Leicester 1-0 Liverpool ( 21 mins) Leonardo Ulloa's shot comes back off the post, hits Mignolet and goes in #LEILIV
GOAL West Brom 1-1 West Ham (35 mins). Nolan nods in from close range following Foster's great save from Carroll's overhead kick #WBAWHU
RED CARD Leicester skipper Wes Morgan is sent off for hauling down Rickie Lambert. Leicester 1-2 Liverpool (63 mins) #LEILIV
FULL-TIME Palace 0-1 Villa. Christian Benteke returns to fire Villa to their first #BPL win in 10 matches #CRYAVL http://t.co/ak4v22RRoK
Leicester 1-3 Liverpool. Gerrard scores on his return to the @LFC team. Read the full report: http://t.co/b7huFgo0gB http://t.co/psQdgkgbih
TABLE After Tuesday's action, the Barclays Premier League standings look like this... #BPL http://t.co/XucAnZHGVw
Arsenal v Southampton: @Arsenal have never lost a #BPL home match v @SouthamptonFC. Preview: http://t.co/LTuZDi42EL http://t.co/tNV9YrhrVG
“We'll do what we can to change history and win here tonight" - Eriksen on Spurs' record at Stamford Bridge #CHETOT http://t.co/z3e1DPmoem
PHOTO Harry Kane and Spurs have made a bright start at Stamford Bridge, but it remains 0-0 (14 mins) #CHETOT http://t.co/luSTeTHbsk
Sergio Aguero has 13 goals in 13 #BPL appearances this season. It's Sunderland 1-2 Man City at half-time #SUNMCI http://t.co/CYKE1Bv26U
Top scorer @aguerosergiokun now has 14 goals in 13 #BPL appearances #SUNMCI http://t.co/X9SW5EuO1m
TABLE Matchweek 14 is over - and unbeaten @chelseafc still lead closest rivals @MCFC by 6pts http://t.co/SnsPYEJ0F6
"He's just 26 & he can still improve. It's very hard for the other teams to stop him" - Pellegrini on #Aguero http://t.co/LeJoSYRad7
.@chelseafc are on the longest current unbeaten run of #BPL matches (17 - W13 D4) #CHETOT http://t.co/LYLrF38hC8
Find out more about the Christmas Truce International Tournament, which kicks off next week: http://t.co/vScx0RPQ8N http://t.co/dRobBS9bWE
.@NUFC have won the last two #BPL matches v @chelseafc at St. James' Park. Will they make it three in a row? #NEWCHE http://t.co/RkhkdriFTC
WATCH Find out why St James' Park is one of three #BPL grounds that Jose Mourinho has not enjoyed visiting: http://t.co/9GiKVFSjXF
Frank Lampard could draw level with @ThierryHenry on the all-time #BPL scorers list in #MCIEVE on Saturday... http://t.co/72LzHRISWF
POLL UPDATE The No's have it at the moment... There's still plenty of time for you to vote at http://t.co/5vCtFIZrwN http://t.co/dwgpx5ESYE
PHOTO Chelsea have had 10 attempts on goal with Willian coming closest, but it remains 0-0 after 27 minutes #NEWCHE http://t.co/dmQIUOOQFx
SUB @NUFC make their final change on 83 minutes - Mike Williamson comes on for Sammy Ameobi. The home side lead Chelsea 2-0 #NEWCHE
.@NUFC matchwinner @CissePapiss: "I'm so happy. I just do my job. If I'm on the bench, I wait for my chance." #NEWCHE http://t.co/H5nFq77wip
GOAL Stoke 2-0 Arsenal (35 mins). Jonathan Walters crosses in from the right and Bojan runs in at the near-post to slot home #STKARS
GOAL QPR 2-0 Burnley (74 mins). Charlie Austin scores his 8th #BPL goal of the season, turning in Mauricio Isla's cross #QPRBUR
TEAM NEWS After the draw at Hull, Hibbert and Eto'o start for @Everton in place of Osman and Barkley #MCIEVE
GOAL Man City 1-0 Everton (24 mins). Howard goes the right way but @YayaToure finds the bottom corner from the penalty spot #MCIEVE
SUB Osman replaces Mirallas for @Everton as the visitors look for a late equaliser. Man City still lead 1-0 (89 mins) #MCIEVE
WATCH “Unlucky day for us - lucky day for them and that’s football." @chelseafc boss Jose Mourinho tastes defeat: http://t.co/qtCAlSnzVP
Papiss Cisse ended a run of 498 minutes in all competitions since Chelsea conceded. Report: http://t.co/hzP0y5xbwv http://t.co/T1YeGzvOKP
The #BPL Matchweek 15 action continues on Sunday: It's West Ham v Swansea (1330 GMT) and Aston Villa v Leicester (1600 GMT)

SUB Marc Albrighton replaces Schlupp in the final change of the match for @OfficialFOXES. Villa 2-1 Leicester (78 mins) #AVLLEI
